cleanmac.hero_subtitle: Keep your Mac clean, fast, and optimized
cleanmac.hero_description: A powerful tool to clean system caches, browser data, temporary files, and more. Works seamlessly with our Chrome extension.
cleanmac.hero_badge_rating_sub: Real feedback from the open-source community
cleanmac.features_subtitle: Comprehensive system cleanup in one click
cleanmac.feature_system_desc: Remove temporary system files and application caches
cleanmac.feature_browser_desc: Clear cache from Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge
cleanmac.feature_temp_desc: Delete temporary files that are no longer needed
cleanmac.feature_logs_desc: Remove old log files that take up disk space
cleanmac.feature_dev_desc: Clean Xcode, npm, Yarn, CocoaPods caches
cleanmac.feature_trash_desc: Empty your Trash with one click
cleanmac.feature_schedule_desc: Schedule automatic cleanups to keep your Mac running smoothly
cleanmac.download_note: Drag the app to Applications folder to install
cleanmac.extension_subtitle: Clean your browser cache with one click
cleanmac.extension_desc: Our Chrome extension lets you clear your browser cache instantly without leaving your current page.
cleanmac.comparisons_subtitle: Compare against other popular tools and see where we win.
cleanmac.comparisons_choice_title: Built for people who want fast, transparent cleaning without ads.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit1_desc: Full cleanup without pop-ups or aggressive upsell.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit2_desc: Full transparency for users who care about security and privacy.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit3_desc: No subscriptions or tricks; lifetime access to the macOS app.
cleanmac.comparisons_benefit4_desc: Clean browser and macOS with the same brand experience.
cleanmac.comp_onyx_desc: Powerful but aimed at advanced users. CleanMac brings a modern UI with safe presets.
cleanmac.comp_ccleaner_desc: Free tier is limited with heavy upsell. CleanMac has no ads and charges once.
cleanmac.comp_appcleaner_desc: Removes apps but not system caches or junk. CleanMac does a full cleanup.
cleanmac.comp_buhocleaner_desc: Paid and closed-source. CleanMac is Software with an accessible one-time price.
cleanmac.comp_daisydisk_desc: Great for visualizing space, not for automatic cleanup. CleanMac cleans in one click.
cleanmac.comp_mackeeper_desc: Heavy and controversial suite. CleanMac is lightweight, transparent, and bloat-free.
cleanmac.comp_iboysoft_desc: Paid disk manager. CleanMac focuses on fast, lightweight cleanup.
cleanmac.comp_avast_desc: Recurring billing and telemetry. CleanMac doesn't track and has no subscriptions.
cleanmac.faq_q1: Is CleanMac App safe to use?
cleanmac.faq_a1: Yes, CleanMac App only removes temporary files and caches that are safe to delete. Your personal files are never touched.
cleanmac.faq_q2: Does it work on Apple Silicon Macs?
cleanmac.faq_a2: Yes, CleanMac App works on both Intel and Apple Silicon (M1, M2, M3) Macs.
cleanmac.faq_a3: No, it's a one-time payment for lifetime access. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.
cleanmac.faq_a4: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied.
cleanmac.footer_desc: Free,  Mac cleanup tool. Keep your Mac running smoothly.
cleanmac.download_page_subtitle_success: Payment confirmed. Download the appropriate version for your Mac.
cleanmac.download_page_subtitle_error: We need the session_id to unlock the download.
cleanmac.download_page_apple_silicon_desc: Recommended for Macs with Apple Silicon chips.
cleanmac.download_page_password_note: The downloaded file is password protected. Use the password: cleanmac2025
